content:
Department of  Computer Science 

 The Department of Computer Science (Self- Finance) was established in 2016 and the Management has facilitated a well equipped laboratory to keep up with the recent trends and demands of the ever changing technology. The laboratory is provided with 50 computers with advanced configurations and uninterrupted power supply for the smooth conduct of  practicals. The department has well qualified and experienced staff to cater the needs of the students. Periodic upgradation of the syllabus and choice of optional papers depending on the latest Technology are the highlights of the present course.
